name: SimplyInsured
headline: We sell health insurance to small businesses 100% online.
description:
SimplyInsured was founded with one mission: to eliminate fear from health insurance. By changing the way small business owners purchase health insurance with our 100% online platform, we’re transforming a $20 billion dollar industry and delighting thousands of customers. 

Our unique values-based culture (and extremely talented team) is our core competitive advantage, and each person on our team makes a direct, immediate impact on our business. 

We value transparency, feedback, bias to action, growth, and an obligation to dissent. Every opinion is respected, we hold each other to extremely high standards, we’re driven by the diversity in our backgrounds, and unified by 100% alignment on our mission. 

What’s best for the customer is the heart of everything we do, and our customer stories prove it: by changing health insurance we’re literally saving lives. 

Based in San Francisco, SimplyInsured was founded in 2012 and is back by Bessemer Venture Partners, Polaris Ventures, and Y-Combinator. If you’re up for the challenge of improving health insurance for millions of Americans, we’re just getting started, and we’re growing!

#  Simple Small Business Health Insurance 
![](https://21756504.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/21756504/SI%20-%20Photography/homepage_hero_img_m.jpg)
## Save up to $500 per employee per year.
Enter Zip Code
Email Address
Number of employees
1-4 5-49 50+
## Supported National Carriers
## Supported National Carriers
![United Healthcare](https://21756504.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/21756504/SI%20-%20Third%20Party/logos-united-healthcare.svg)
![Humana](https://21756504.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/21756504/SI%20-%20Third%20Party/logos-humana.svg)
![Blue Cross Blue Shield](https://21756504.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/21756504/SI%20-%20Third%20Party/Carriers/logos-bluecross@2x.png)
![Kaiser Permanente](https://21756504.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/21756504/SI%20-%20Third%20Party/Carriers/logos-kaiser@2x.png)
![Anthem Blue Cross](https://21756504.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/21756504/SI%20-%20Third%20Party/Carriers/logos-anthem@2x.png)
![laptop@2x](https://21756504.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/21756504/SI%20-%20Photography%20and%20Graphics/Content%20Images/laptop@2x.png) ![laptop@2x](https://21756504.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/21756504/SI%20-%20Photography%20and%20Graphics/Content%20Images/laptop@2x.png)
##  See hundreds of small business plans at once 
We offer thousands of health insurance plans across the country from all major carriers. Choose from the best medical, dental, and vision plans available in your area. SimplyInsured provides unbiased recommendations to help find the best fit for your business. Our services, recommendations, and online platform are 100% free. 
![](https://21756504.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/21756504/SI%20-%20Icons/vuesax-broken-money-send.svg)
## Free Instant Quote
With SimplyInsured, there is no waiting to hear back from your broker. We give you every plan instantly, customizable for your exact situation.
![](https://21756504.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/21756504/SI%20-%20Icons/vuesax-broken-monitor-mobbile.svg)
## 10 Minutes, 100% Online
Our application can be completed quickly and entirely online. During this process employees complete their own individual, online applications.
![](https://21756504.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/21756504/SI%20-%20Icons/vuesax-broken-setting-2.svg)
## Fully Automated Payroll Deductions
We offer one click integrations with most major payroll platforms. We automatically manage employee deductions, company contributions, and ensure any changes are properly handled.
## Our mission is to eliminate fear in health insurance.
Our dedicated, full-time customer support team works for you, not the insurance carriers. We take care of everything from answering insurance questions to resolving insurance issues on behalf of you and your employees.
[Get Instant Quote](http://simplyinsured.com/</small-group/first-quote>)
## Compare the benefits of Simply**Insured** vs. Traditional Brokers
Simply**Insured** | Traditional Brokers  
---|---  
Plan Premiums
Price set by law
Price set by law
Fees
No Fees
No Fees
Payroll Integration
Fully integrated deductions with Intuit QuickBooks, Square Payroll, and more. Easy setup for ADP, Paychex, and other payroll systems
Some help calculating deductions by yourself
Renewals
1-click renewals, online open enrollment with no headaches
Fill out, sign, and fax new forms and paperwork every year
Support
Team of licensed insurance agents and experts to answer all of your questions and assist with claims
Limited support, you contact insurance carriers directly for help
Plans
Hundreds of plans, many carriers
Small number of plans, limited carrier relationships
Employee Onboarding
Onboarding completed in minutes, entirely online, with new hire benefits all in one place
Manually onboard with paper forms and wait weeks for processing and confirmation

![Smiling man in glasses and pink shirt](https://21756504.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/21756504/SI%20-%20Photography%20and%20Graphics/Testimonial%20Images/quote_1_img_d.png)
"SimplyInsured made buying insurance a very simple process but more importantly, I received amazing customer support. Where insurance carriers were slow, SimplyInsured was prompt and personal in their responses." 
**Nik** , R&M Construction Company
  * ![Smiling young man with dark hair](https://21756504.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/21756504/SI%20-%20Photography%20and%20Graphics/Testimonial%20Images/quote_2_img_d.png)
![Smiling young man with dark hair](https://21756504.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/21756504/SI%20-%20Photography%20and%20Graphics/Testimonial%20Images/quote_2_img_d.png)
"All the issues I have encountered have been handled swiftly and with professionalism. I really appreciate the support service offered to all my employees. Having a professional staff to answer higher level problems is great for a growing company like mine."
**Andrew** , Express Dry Cleaning
  * ![Smiling woman in business suit](https://21756504.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/21756504/SI%20-%20Photography%20and%20Graphics/Testimonial%20Images/quote_3_img_d.png)
![Smiling woman in business suit](https://21756504.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/21756504/SI%20-%20Photography%20and%20Graphics/Testimonial%20Images/quote_3_img_d.png)
"I was just released from the ER with a blood clot. The only reason they found it is because you guys advocated to make sure that my ultrasound was covered. You all very literally saved my life and there is nothing I can possibly say that will express my gratitude."
**Sam** , Customer for over 2 years

generated_description:
SimplyInsured is on a mission that resonates deeply in today’s world: to eliminate the fear and complexity often associated with health insurance, particularly for small businesses. Founded in 2012 and hailing from San Francisco, this innovative company has leaned into the digital landscape to provide a 100% online platform for health insurance procurement. Backed by reputable investors such as Bessemer Venture Partners, Polaris Ventures, and Y Combinator, SimplyInsured is transforming a $20 billion industry in ways that matter—delighting thousands of customers along the way.

At the core of SimplyInsured’s approach is a values-driven culture. They emphasize transparency, feedback, and a strong commitment to action and growth. This culture empowers every employee—and there are about 35 of them—to directly impact the business, fostering both individual and collective excellence. The company prides itself on respecting diverse opinions and encourages dissenting voices to ensure they are always improving.

Their platform sets users up with the ability to compare health insurance plans from major carriers like United Healthcare, Blue Cross Blue Shield, and Kaiser Permanente, all within minutes and without the back-and-forth typically associated with traditional brokers. SimplyInsured offers a unique value proposition: free, unbiased recommendations tailored to each business's needs, and everything can be completed online. This means busy owners can secure health coverage with just a few clicks, saving time and avoiding headaches along the way.

Support is another strong pillar for SimplyInsured. Their dedicated customer support team works for the customers, not the insurance carriers. This approach has proven effective, with testimonials highlighting their responsiveness and effectiveness in resolving issues—sometimes with life-saving outcomes for their customers.

If you're a small business owner looking to navigate the often daunting waters of health insurance, SimplyInsured offers a way to do it without losing your mind or your wallet. Their services are designed to align perfectly with what’s best for the customer—because that’s truly at the heart of everything they do.

To explore their offerings or to get an instant quote, visit [SimplyInsured.com](http://simplyinsured.com). They are just getting started, and it’s clear they have ambitious plans for the future.
